visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data. Custom colors should be used for the plot line and series. Additional configurations include setting chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray. The chart has specific margins for better spacing. The x-axis categories represent months, and a red plot line is added to indicate a specific value. The y-axis title and labels are styled with a darker color and a slightly larger font size. The data series represents monthly rainfall data with a green color. The legend is enabled and styled with a dark color and a standard font size. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
